EmailTemplate.subject: FalconConnect Portal – Preparing for Takeoff on September 29
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=customer}},
A new look, redesigned FalconConnect portal is coming soon to your flight department. On September 29, you’ll have access to this expanded enterprise performance management (EPM) offering via your current subscription with FalconConnect.
What’s new in the FalconConnect portal? In-flight connectivity, flight planning & optimization, and flight database services in a single seamless, platform covering:
Who has Access? Anyone who is a customer of our FalconConnect service whether it’s flight planning, connectivity airtime, navigation databases or datalink will have access to the platform. Starting on September 29 when you login to your FalconConnect account you’ll have immediate access to the new look portal.
New portal. Same excellent quality of service. Everything you loved about FalconConnect is now part of the new look portal, an enterprise performance management platform with the industry’s most comprehensive connected software offering for business aviation.
Questions? Contact our team <[[mailto:FalconConnect@honeywell.com]]>. We can’t wait to hear from you.
FalconConnect
